tour_name: Komodo Dragon Expedition & Bali Luxury Retreat

sections.title: Ubud's Enchanting Luxury
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in the heart of Bali with a luxurious retreat in Ubud. Discover the island's spiritual side with visits to sacred temples like Tirta Empul, where you can partake in a purification ritual, and Gunung Kawi, marveling at the ancient rock-cut shrines. Indulge in a rejuvenating traditional Balinese massage, designed to melt away stress and enhance your well-being. Then, embark on an exhilarating 4WD jeep adventure through West Bali's rugged landscapes, uncovering hidden waterfalls and breathtaking panoramic views. Culminate your Ubud experience with an unforgettable 11-course fine dining experience, a culinary journey that will tantalize your taste buds amidst the lush greenery. Each day ends with unparalleled comfort, designed to celebrate your honeymoon in style.

sections.title: Komodo Dragon Expedition Aboard a Luxury Phinisi
sections.content: Begin your Komodo adventure with a private flight to Labuan Bajo, where a luxurious Phinisi boat awaits to whisk you away into the Komodo National Park. Witness the raw power and prehistoric beauty of the Komodo dragons on Rinca and Komodo Islands, observing these magnificent creatures in their natural habitat. Dive into the turquoise waters of Pink Beach and Makassar Reef, encountering vibrant coral reefs and an array of marine life during guided snorkeling and diving excursions. As the sun dips below the horizon, savor a romantic sunset dinner cruise under the stars, with exquisite cuisine and breathtaking views that will create an unforgettable memory. Each evening on the Phinisi is a private affair, tailored to your preferences, with gourmet meals, premium drinks, and unparalleled service.

sections.title: Unveiling Komodo's Hidden Gems
sections.content: Continue your exploration of the Komodo Islands, venturing to Padar Island for iconic panoramic views that capture the essence of the archipelago. Explore the pristine waters around Gili Lawa, diving and snorkeling amidst diverse marine ecosystems. Immerse yourselves in the local culture of Labuan Bajo, visiting local markets and experiencing the authentic flavors of Indonesian cuisine, where a private chef can bring the flavors to you for a perfect romantic meal on the beach. Indulge in private spa treatments on board the Phinisi, relaxing and rejuvenating your body and soul as you cruise through the stunning landscapes.

sections.title: Return to Bali & Coastal Bliss
sections.content: Bid farewell to the Komodo Islands and return to Bali for a final chapter of relaxation. Enjoy a luxurious beach stay, indulging in the soothing sounds of the ocean and the warmth of the tropical sun. You will be given a choice between Jimbaran Bay for fresh seafood and sunset views, or Seminyak for trendy beach clubs and high-end shopping. Enjoy the best Bali has to offer as you reflect on your unforgettable honeymoon adventure before preparing for your departure. Optionally, if your departing city is near a Michelin star restaurant you can have an farewell dinner at one before catching your flight to savor the flavours of a lifetime.
